briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Oral Ibrexafungerp (SCY-078) vs. Placebo in Subjects With Acute Vulvovaginal Candidiasis
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Multicenter, Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo Controlled Study to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Oral Ibrexafungerp (SCY-078) vs. Placebo in Subjects With Acute Vulvovaginal Candidiasis (AVVC).
summary: This is a Phase 3, randomized, multicenter, double-blind, placebo-controlled study to evaluate the efficacy and safety of oral Ibrexafungerp (SCY-078) compared to placebo in female subjects 12 years and older with AVVC.

primaryOutcome.measure: Clinical Cure (Complete Resolution of Signs and Symptoms)
